definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
sentences.chinese: 將指定的十進制數的值轉換爲等效的單精度浮點數。

sentences.english: Computer principle of a floating point arithmetic unit.
sentences.chinese: 計算機組成原理的一個浮點數運算器。

sentences.english: For floating-point and fixed-point types, M is the total number of digits that can be stored.
sentences.chinese: 對於浮點數及定點類型，M是數字存儲的總位數。

sentences.english: They don't distinguish between integer and floating point numbers. Variables are typeless.
sentences.chinese: 腳本不區分整數和浮點數，變量是沒有類型的。
製作一個單一浮點數可拖動控制柄。

sentences.english: If you're reading a floating point number, there are other concerns.
sentences.chinese: 如果您讀取的浮點數，還有另外需要關注的問題。

sentences.english: This is similar to the modulo operator but it works with floating point numbers.
sentences.chinese: 這是類似於模運算符，但可以使用浮點數。

sentences.english: Converts a specified value to a single-precision floating-point number.
sentences.chinese: 將指定的值轉換爲單精確度浮點數。
編寫一個單精度浮點數。

sentences.english: Just write a program to find the max of x and y.
sentences.chinese: 就寫個程序找出浮點數x和y中的最大值吧。

sentences.english: Does a negative floating point mantissa also with or without sign it?
sentences.chinese: 請問一個負數的浮點數的尾數還帶不帶符號呀？

sentences.english: Converts the specified Boolean value to the equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
sentences.chinese: 傳回指定的單精確度浮點數，不執行實際的轉換。

sentences.english: It would be best to try to avoid floating point comparison entirely.
sentences.chinese: 最好完全避免使用浮點數比較。

sentences.english: Returns the specified single-precision floating-point number; no actual conversion is performed.
sentences.chinese: 將指定之物件的值，轉換爲單精確度浮點數。

sentences.english: All it does is return a floating point number representing the temperature.
sentences.chinese: 它只是返回一個表示溫度的浮點數。
